post_title: bind "b" "buymenu" not working in auto exec
post_body:
I'm making my autoexec and whenever i press b for buymenu it doesnt work and it says

" Unknown command '-buymenu'!"

" Unknown command '+buymenu'!"

but then  when i paste that EXACT same command in console it works right after. it only seems to break the bind whenever i run the command thru auto exec

post_title: 3-0 pickems are not counted as advance in 6 slot tab despite advancing to the next stage.
post_body:
So current pickems are not counted as previous ones, the tactic for past years for majors was not to put best teams in 3-0 slots as they often loosing one map so it was easier to put em in 6 advance slots and even if they hit 3-0 they would still count as advance.


Not on this major this major despite even the name of the tab is still  "ADVANCE" is not counting 3-0 teams that advanced to the next stage as the advance ones, this was not happening I belive in any previous major and its not how the tab should be called if it works like that.

Here is the [pick](https://imgur.com/a/nX1zzNR) I had both Vitality and Mongolz as advanced teams and they both dont count but they both advanced.

This shit isn't starting at all, tried verifying integrity, reinstalling, deleting a folder named '730', restarting my shit and updating my drivers, starting it from the .exe and adding compatibility mode 

  
starting from the .exe works, but if I try playing I get a VAC error saying I need anticheat, no I am not VAC banned.

post_title: NAF changed mouse sensitivity from 800 * 0.7 to 800 * 1.2 before elimination stage in Shanghai ðŸ¤¯
Valve DMs need to have a rework
post_body:
Before you guys typed "Just go community FFA DMs", lobbies tend to have 0-2 people in one map based on where I live. Just want to put it out there first. If there are more people in community FFA DMs, I would just DM over there instead.

Valve DMs are really bad. Spawn points are weird and makes no sense. Why am I spawning in middle of A long when I am open to 3-4 enemies aiming me down? What's the point of spawning just to die because the spawn point put me in the middle of the open? Spawn invincibility need to be reduced to stop people from camping there.

They need to change spawn points and reduce spawn invincibility.

post_title: MongolZ vs MOUZ sets new esports record for Mongolian viewership

post_body: Man for the first day of playoffs can't say I'm impressed with some of the production values so far. Caster delays and audio mixing issues being the most prevalent which is a shame because the earlier stages were phenomenal. I hope PGL can iron these issues out especially when the final comes
My microphone in very quiet in the game. I have tried all the fixes that i could find. When i check in the steam overlay it is all good. If anyone know the fix I would be glad to hear it.

post_title: Are they using $5 mics on the English stream?
post_body:
Everytime the casters scream or get loud the sound distorts like it's a $5 mic.

Fml.

It may be a Perfect World major but the English stream is hosted by.... you guessed it - PGL!!!! How can a company be so *consistently* bad over the years holy shit.

post_title: is there a gaming YTer equivalent to Handler for CS?
post_body:
I've always listened to gameplay on the side with minimal commentary on the side while at work. While I find guys like Handler and jackfrags entertaining/unintrusive enough, I'm feeling for some CS2 content, which is exactly what these guys DON'T play.

Unfortunately the Shanghai major is way too hyped and nerve-wracking as background noise, and dima/Anomaly isn't what I'm looking for. Is there channels out there and do pure gameplay without excessive editing?

post_title: Do the bullets tracers still show where the bullets are going in CS2?
post_body: Do the bullet tracers still show where the bullets are going in CS2? I've heard a lot of mixed answers about this, but from my experience playing it, it doesn't feel like they do.

Game finished 11-13

left the game.. try to queue another says "You have ongoing match to reconnect"

restarting game

shows tab to reconnect or abandon that finished match

reconnect says "match finished"

so only option abandon > got 10 min cooldown

Cooldown for finished match

wut...

Somehow some Russian entered into my Steam acc
Yadda yadda, yadda 
Bypassed 2FA ( absolute shit )
And traded all my stuff away .

All I care is how I can my my acc safer now , on steam guard I've removed hackers access and changed my passwords on steam

Guy changed my Google acc too and somehow bastard even got into my Hoyoverse ACCS and changed their passwords.

You know that thing that prevents you from trading for 15 days ? Might aswell be shit

Help me out tightening security , won't buy/trade ever again , hell I don't even know if I wanna keep playing 

Just want to keep the leaks to a minimum now
